author: hdu
msg: #c705682# fix a minor resource leak in ScXMLTextPContext::AddSpaces()

author: kwall
msg: NO-JIRA: Reenable the BDBHAMBean and its system tests.
Added MBeanProvider interface. The provider accepts a ConfiguredObject and can, if it wishes, can an mbean for that child, or it can choose
JMXService changed to use a ServiceLoader to find all implementations of MBeanProvider.  As each childAdded event is heard, it offers
the new child to all the MBeanProvider implementations.
BDBHAMessageStoreManagerMBean moved to separate module (bdbstore/jmx).  The new module is an OSGI bundle _fragment_ which hosts itself
with broker-plugins-jmx (if present). BDBHAMessageStoreManagerMBeanProvider is the source of BDBHAMessageStoreManagerMBeans.  It creates
an mbean for children of type VirtualHost whose underlying source implementation is BDBHAMessageStore.

author: kelly
msg: Fix OODT-465 (save for XML Namespace URIs; awaiting discussion on dev@oodt.apache.org)

author: hdu
msg: #c705715# fix a resource leak in SfxOrganizeMgr::Delete
